${ModID}:Strike.NAME: Strike
${ModID}:Strike.LORE: We've lost so many wizards we have to send our apprentices to the battle field.  Some of them are only good at hitting the monsters with a stick.

${ModID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend.LORE: A shield isn't as good as a spell but at least you can learn to use it faster.

${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.NAME: Resonate
${ModID}:GenericResonantCard.LORE: You can use this over and over.

${ModID}:IceDamage.NAME: Cold
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When an enemy with Frostbite attacks they take damage equal to their Frostbite and reduce Frostbite by 1.

${ModID}:DarkDamage.NAME: Dark
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #yTemporary #yHP based on unblocked damage dealt.  Has diminishing returns.
Temporary HP is lost at the end of battle.

${ModID}:ForceDamage.NAME: Force
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Crushed enemies take more damage from attacks.

${ModID}:AcidSpray.NAME: Acid Spray
${ModID}:AcidSpray.LORE: Not one of my favored elements, but it's great for eating through defenses.

${ModID}:Miasma.NAME: Miasma
${ModID}:Miasma.DESCRIPTION: Apply !${ModID}:M2! Weak. NL Target deals !M! less damage with attacks this turn.
${ModID}:Miasma.LORE: The victims can never say what exactly was wrong with them, only that it was a horrible feeling.

${ModID}:FrozenLance.NAME: Frozen Lance
${ModID}:FrozenLance.LORE: This spell was invented by the Aqualance?  What kind of stupid name is that?

${ModID}:PhantomFist.NAME: Phantom Fist
${ModID}:PhantomFist.LORE: It's like hitting them with a fist, except the fist is the size of a watermelon and made of steel.

${ModID}:VoidTendrils.NAME: Void Tendrils
${ModID}:VoidTendrils.LORE: It is a fantastic spell for offense and defense but it looks evil so NOOOOOO, we shouldn't use it.

${ModID}:Rapids.NAME: Rapids
${ModID}:Rapids.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you play a card this turn, discard !M! random card to draw !M! card.{!Upgrades!|<1= NL Exhaust.}

${ModID}:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
${ModID}:Barrier.LORE: A great spell for when you need to defend yourself but stay mobile.

${ModID}:Blink.NAME: Blink
${ModID}:Blink.LORE: Quite often the best defense is simply not being there.

${ModID}:BarrierJa.NAME: Barrierja
${ModID}:BarrierJa.LORE: Who the fuck named it that?

${ModID}:SoulFlame.NAME: SoulFlame
${ModID}:SoulFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${ModID}:SoulFireIcon] damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard a card.
${ModID}:SoulFlame.LORE: With soul flame, it isn't the body that's burning, so your ice spells still work.

${ModID}:TinglingSigil.NAME: Tingling Sigil
${ModID}:TinglingSigil.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sigil. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:TinglingSigil.LORE: The great thing about sigils is they can be prepared ahead of time, so they don't use up your mana.

${ModID}:HardSigil.NAME: Hard Sigil
${ModID}:HardSigil.LORE: Sigils have the qualities of the spell stored inside, though to a lesser degree.  This shielding spell makes its sigil tough to break.

${ModID}:CursedSigil.NAME: Cursed Sigil
${ModID}:CursedSigil.LORE: A proper sigil can only be activated by a trigger word spoken by its creator.  You wouldn't want a hexing sigil going off while you're carrying it, so enchant it properly.

${ModID}:BurningSigil.NAME: Burning Sigil
${ModID}:BurningSigil.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sigil. NL Deal !D! [${ModID}:SoulFireIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! HP.
${ModID}:BurningSigil.LORE: Our country is being overrun by these spire monsters.  Yes, I paid a price for this power, but it is a lesser price than losing this war.

${ModID}:IronSigil.NAME: Iron Sigil
${ModID}:IronSigil.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sigil. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
${ModID}:IronSigil.LORE: This spell isn't particularly powerful but lasts quite a while, so use it in longer combats.

${ModID}:WailingSigil.NAME: Wailing Sigil
${ModID}:WailingSigil.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sigil. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.
${ModID}:WailingSigil.LORE: If you enchant this one properly, it makes a constant squealing sound.  The stronger the spell, the more annoying the squeal.

${ModID}:ChameleonSigil.NAME: Chameleon Sigil
${ModID}:ChameleonSigil.DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Sigil. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Shadowcloak.{!Upgrades!|<1= NL Draw 1 less card next turn.}

${ModID}:ColdSigil.NAME: Cold Sigil
${ModID}:ColdSigil.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sigil. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite to ALL enemies per debuff they have.
${ModID}:ColdSigil.LORE: This is a mean one. NL The more pain they're already suffering, the more they hurt.

${ModID}:BlackSigil.NAME: Black Sigil
${ModID}:BlackSigil.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sigil. NL Whenever you attack this turn, gain !M! Temporary_HP.
${ModID}:BlackSigil.LORE: It's not really black, its void.  The absence of light, dark, color, anything like that.  But of course our eyes can't see that.  This scares a lot of people away but its fine, really.  Everything's fine.

${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.NAME: Crumbling Sigil
${ModID}:CrumblingSigil.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sigil. NL ALL enemies take !M! damage at the start of their turn.

${ModID}:BrrZerk.NAME: Brr Zerk
${ModID}:BrrZerk.LORE: This difficult technique is not a spell, but a way to alter your spells to also freeze the target.

${ModID}:Gale.NAME: Gale
${ModID}:Gale.LORE: Pushing your opponent away is a great way to get room for a stronger spell.

${ModID}:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
${ModID}:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [${ModID}:SoulFireIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Eruption.LORE: All right, shit like this is why I studied magic!

${ModID}:WellPrepared.NAME: Prepared
${ModID}:WellPrepared.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 1 card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${ModID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play an attack each turn, draw !M! card.
${ModID}:Momentum.LORE: If you can cast spells and run at the same time, that is much better than being a sitting duck.  Don't neglect your physical training.

${ModID}:Spray.NAME: Spray
${ModID}:Spray.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your entire hand and gain !M! Block for each card discarded.
${ModID}:Spray.LORE: A simple propulsion spell is so much more deadly when you carry a lot of small sharp metal objects.

${ModID}:Dash.NAME: Dash
${ModID}:Dash.LORE: Not my favorite strategy, but sometimes you just gotta run like fuck.

${ModID}:Haste.NAME: Haste
${ModID}:Haste.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|1=Innate. NL }At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.
